TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlValueGetter extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: An delegate is useful if the CLR value of an attribute, text, or white space node is already available, and avoids the cost of converting it to a string and then reparsing it again for validation.
For more information about the class, see the XmlSchemaValidator Push-Based Validation topic, or the class reference documentation.

summary.para: A delegate used by the class to pass attribute, text, and white space values as a Common Language Runtime (CLR) type compatible with the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) type of the attribute, text, or white space.
